DataElement.preferredName: Original Biospecimen Storage Processing Temperature Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The temperature in Celsius of the original specimen prior to final storage processing.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or being as first made or performed._Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._The act of safekeeping goods in a depository._The act of preparing or putting through a prescribed procedure._A measure of the average kinetic energy of a system of particles. Temperature may be quantified, in the context of thermodynamics, as the potential of one system to transfer thermal energy to another system until both systems reach a state of thermal equilibrium.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or being as first made or performed.:Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or being as first made or performed.

Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or being as first made or performed._Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A specimen that has been subjected to and adjusted to the average ambient temperature of a room, usually considered to be around 20 degrees C (68 degrees F).

Concepts.definition: A specimen that has been subjected to and adjusted to the average ambient temperature of a room, usually considered to be around 20 degrees C (68 degrees F).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A specimen that has been subjected to and immobilized by severe cold.: A specimen that has been kept or preserved at a low temperature in a refrigerator.

Concepts.definition: A specimen that has been subjected to and immobilized by severe cold.
A specimen that has been kept or preserved at a low temperature in a refrigerator.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Without delay.: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: Without delay.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

PermissibleValues.value: N/A - specimen is an extraction of a previously frozen specimen
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Previous Frozen Specimen Extraction Not Applicable

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Previous Frozen Specimen Extraction Not Applicable
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.: A specimen that has been subjected to and immobilized by severe cold.: The act of pulling out, including the process of obtaining something from a mixture or compound by chemical or physical or mechanical means.: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Occurring prior to something else.
A specimen that has been subjected to and immobilized by severe cold.
The act of pulling out, including the process of obtaining something from a mixture or compound by chemical or physical or mechanical means.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.
